message.content:
To extract the specific line item and its value related to costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers, we will analyze the income statement, as it provides details about costs associated with revenue generation.

In the given income statement, the relevant line items are:

- **Cost of Goods Sold (COGS)**: This item generally encompasses all the direct costs associated with producing the goods sold by a company. It includes costs incurred to deliver goods to customers.

After reviewing the income statement provided:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 1684000.00 | 2024-02-05 |

The value for Cost of Goods Sold is **1,684,000.00**.

Thus, the cost incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services is represented by the COGS line item.

The solution can be structured as follows:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1684000.00'} }
```
